attributes.additional_details: The nation is fuming! Let it be down to us what we want to put in our body’s! If needs be we will pay the extra cost. Just let it be down to us!
attributes.background: The new ribena tastes ‘vile’ & ‘disgusting’! Ribena has always been my favourite drink, growing up every time I was poorly my parents would always make me a glass, but for that sweet memorie to be absolutely destroyed with this new low sugar Ribena is a disgrace! BRING BACK CLASSIC!
